answers.answer: What Limit on insulin?I know of no limit as to the amount of insulin you NEED to maintain good BG.  There is also restricting your carb intake to reduce your insulin needs
This was a comment on the limits on the diabetes tracker. I don't know why they moved it here.
Aaaa   thats easy,    a T1 was for the model that the program writers used.

question: I take a lot of insulin especially when I've had a bad food day and sometimes I go over 100 units/day. Would it be possible to raise the limits?Thanks
title: Higher Limits on Insulin Units
